name: Jolly Shot
description: Fires a single linear shot of festive energy. Slow projectile speed.

name: Bell Shield
description: Summons a stationary, holographic bell shield that blocks incoming attacks before degrading.

name: Popcorn Wall
description: A wall of popcorn seeds appears behind the player, which then instantly pops, sending explosive projectiles forward in an AoE rectangle.
effects: Explosive damage (Fire), large area of effect.

name: Sucker Well
description: Creates a temporary gravity well that pulls enemies toward the center, replacing traditional gravity effects with sweet suckers.

name: Orange Crusher
description: A large orange manifests, its skin peels back, and the individual slices launch sequentially at the target.

name: Carrot Projectile
description: Fires a carrot projectile. Can be charged to launch up to three piercing carrots simultaneously.

name: Snowball
effects: Minor damage, builds up **Frost** status effect.

name: Chocolate Golem
description: Charge to summon a Golem made of chocolate. Size and behavior vary based on charge length (Minion-Basic-Large).
effects: Summons temporary minion, size/HP scales with charge.

name: Ice Wall
description: Creates a destructible, area-denial ice wall. Enemies who approach are knocked back and receive Frostbite damage.

name: Ice Shards
effects: Multi-hit projectile, Piercing and Frost damage.
